-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Examples for the reactive-banana library, using threepenny-gui.
--   
--   This library provides some GUI examples for the
--   <tt>reactive-banana</tt> library, using <tt>threepenny-gui</tt>.
--   
--   Note: This library contains examples, but they are not built by
--   default. To build and install the example, use the
--   <tt>buildExamples</tt> flag like this
--   
--   <pre>
--   cabal install reactive-banana-threepenny -fbuildExamples
--   </pre>
--   
--   Stability forecast: The wrapper functions are rather provisional.
@package reactive-banana-threepenny
@version 0.7.1.3

module Reactive.Banana.Threepenny

-- | Obtain an event for an element.
event :: Frameworks t => (x -> Event a) -> x -> Moment t (Event t a)

-- | Behavior from an attribute. Uses <a>fromPoll</a>, so may behave as you
--   expect.
behavior :: Frameworks t => ReadWriteAttr x i o -> x -> Moment t (Behavior t o)

-- | <a>Animate</a> an attribute with a behavior.
sink :: Frameworks t => ReadWriteAttr x i o -> Behavior t i -> Moment t x -> Moment t ()

-- | Event that occurs when the <i>user</i> changes the value of the input
--   element.
eventValue :: Frameworks t => Element -> Moment t (Event t String)

-- | Behavior corresponding to user input in the element.
behaviorValue :: Frameworks t => Element -> String -> Moment t (Behavior t String)

-- | Event that occurs when the <i>user</i> changes the selection of a
--   <tt><a>select</a></tt> element.
eventSelection :: Frameworks t => Element -> Moment t (Event t (Maybe Int))
